abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile focuses on National
            Solidarity Project in Afghanistan. A quarter century of war
            and civil strife in the country seriously damaged rural
            infrastructure and fractured local communities. National
            Solidarity Program elected village-level community
            Development Councils in which women played a key role, to
            implement priority sub projects. As a result, the villages
            have schools for both boys and girls, electricity for the
            homes, and clean drinking water for all.
